name: AudioControl Rialto 600 2.1-Channel Compact Zone Amplifier and DAC (Black)

overviewFields.title: Rialto 600 2.1-Channel Compact Zone Amplifier and DAC
overviewFields.value: AudioControl has built on the success of its Rialto 400 amplifier/DAC by adding Volume Control to launch the Rialto 600. The Rialto 600 is a breakthrough compact high-power Ampfier/DAC in one, with the ability to control volume making it an ideal solution for all sources including those with fixed digital output.

overviewFields.title: Rialto 600 Features:
overviewFields.value: Compact Amplifier and Digital Analog Converter (DAC), 2 Channels x 100 Watts at 8 Ohms, 2 Channels x 200 Watts at 4 Ohms, Preamp Volume Control Via IR or RS 232, Stable Down to 3.6 Ohms, Bridgeable Mono Block at 400 Watts, 2 x Digital Optical & COAX Inputs and Analog Stereo Inputs, Subwoofer Output, Wolfson Digital Analog Converter (DAC) For Audiophile Performance, Source Switching Via IR or RS 232, AudioControl Patented AccuBASS Bass Response, Crossover - 12v Trigger Input - Bridgeable - Headphone Input, Compact Size at 8.5”W x 5.4”D x 2.9”H, Remote Control Included

overviewFields.title: Rialto 600 Specifications:
overviewFields.value: Inputs

overviewFields.title: What's In The Box:
overviewFields.value: Rialto 600, RT-1 Remote, Power Cord, Optical Toslink Cable, User Manual, Warranty

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: ACP-RIALTO

name: Chord Electronics Mojo 2 Portable DAC Headphone Amplifier

overviewFields.title: Simply Without Equal
overviewFields.value: Mojo 2 is the most advanced DAC/headphone amplifier in the world. A What Hi-Fi? Product of the Year winner, Mojo 2 uses unique British technology for class-leading sound quality.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Unrivalled digital audio processing

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: High-speed USB-C input

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 'Ultra HD' digital signal processing EQ

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Two 3.5mm headphone outputs

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Constructed of aircraft grade aluminum

overviewFields.title: DAC and Headphone Amplifier in One
overviewFields.value: The British designed, engineered, and built Mojo 2 is the most advanced portable DAC and headphone amplifier in the world. Distinctly different from all other devices, the What Hi-Fi? Product of the Year-winning Mojo 2 uses proprietary British digital audio technology perfected over more than two decades, coupled to a powerful ‘FPGA’ processor. The result is class-leading sound quality both on the move or at home, with the power to effortlessly drive any headphones. For music just as the artist intended, Mojo 2 brings you closer to the music than any other portable.

overviewFields.title: Unique FPGA Technology
overviewFields.value: For more than 25 years, Chord Electronics has exclusively used powerful programmable (FPGA) circuits with custom coding to provide the most advanced digital-to-analogue conversion performance in the world. With digital audio technologies perfected over two decades, Mojo 2 contains more digital audio know-how than any other small DAC, resulting in unrivalled sound quality, all backed by peerless technical measurements from the lab.

overviewFields.title: Compatible With Poly for Streaming
overviewFields.value: Completely compatible with Chord's wireless streamer/player module Poly, for wireless streaming, control and playback.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: MOJO2

name: Eversolo DMP-A8 Network Streamer with Built-In DAC

overviewFields.title: Ultimate Perfection Accurate Representation of Sound
overviewFields.value: The Eversolo DMP-A8 is a premium audio device capable of almost everything, combining music streamer, DAP, DAC, and Preamp all in one device. It is powered by a quad-core ARM Cortex-A55 processor, ensuring smooth performance and features a 6" large LCD color touchscreen. It supports high-quality audio formats including DSD512 Native, PCM768KHz@32Bit, and MQA full decoding. With various connectivity options such as DLNA, UPnP protocols, and Bluetooth 5.0, it offers versatility for all your audio needs.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Master Recording Playback and Decoding (FLAC WAV, APE, DSD512, MQA)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Large 6” LCD Color Touchscreen

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Support for Amazon Music, TIDAL, Qobuz, HIRESAUDIO, Roon Ready, & more

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Eversolo Music Library

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Customizable VU Meters

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Audio Inputs: Coaxial, Optical, Type-C, & HD Bluetooth

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Supports USB, Optical, Coaxial, & HDMI bit-perfect output

overviewFields.title: Unique Appearance
overviewFields.value: The DMP-A8 is made from aviation aluminum and features a CNC machined body for a solid construction. The brushed panel and frosted anodized body are a great combination of classic and modern elements to suit the preferences of experts.

overviewFields.title: Large LCD Touchscreen with Exclusive User Interface
overviewFields.value: Equipped with a large 6" LCD high-definition touchscreen, the DMP-A8 features a professionally tailored streamer system, simple but exquisite user interface, as well as on-screen intuitive touch controls for system settings, local music library, and third party apps. It provides a seamless interactive experience.

overviewFields.title: Rich Inputs and Outputs
overviewFields.value: DMP-A8 can be used as a digital turntable to connect with various high-end DAC by HDMI IIS, USB, optical, and coaxial outputs. As a DAC, it supports a wide range of digital inputs: 2 coaxial, 2 optical, USB B input to connect PCs and mobile devices. As a high-performance preamplifier, it supports analog inputs XLR and RCA. It also supports APTX HD Bluetooth audio input, making it easy to connect with various digital audio sources. The DMP-A8 can be directly paired with active speakers or power amplifier via analog preamp outputs RCA and XLR. The Trigger out port can achieve the linkage with power amplifier systems.

overviewFields.title: Flexible Storage Expansion
overviewFields.value: An M.2 NVMe SSD slot is built in at the bottom of the DMP-A8, allowing for convenient SSD installation without disassembling the device. The DMP-A8 supports SSD up to 4 TB, with faster speed and less noise, providing stable storage for high-quality local music. Additionally, storage devices can be connected externally through the USB OTG port of DMP-A8.

overviewFields.title: Roon Ready Device
overviewFields.value: Roon Ready network devices have Roon’s streaming technology built in, and are certified by Roon Labs to provide the highest level of quality and performance in network streaming.

overviewFields.title: Roon Tested Device
overviewFields.value: Roon Tested devices work over USB, HDMI, AirPlay, Google Cast, and other protocols. They have been profiled by the Roon team to ensure simple setup and effortless daily use.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: DMP-A8

name: HiFi Rose RD160 DAC (Black)

specifications.title: PCM Filter
specifications.value: Sharp Roll-off, Slow Roll-off, Short Delay Sharp Roll-off (default), Short Delay Slow Roll-off, Super Slow Roll-off, Low Dispersion Short Delay

specifications.title: PCM/DSD Upsampling
specifications.value: PCM 44.1kHz to 705kHz, PCM 48.0kHz to 768kHz, DSD64 to DSD512

specifications.title: 1 x USB SFP Module (32bit / 768kHz, Native DSD512)
Analog Output
specifications.value: 2 x Balanced XLR, 2 x Unbalanced RCA

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Balance-Designed DAC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Fiber Optic USB

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Hidden Screen

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: (4) Upsampling Options & (6) Digital Filters

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: External Master Clock Input

overviewFields.title: Upsampling & Filter
overviewFields.value: The RD160 offers various options. For upsampling, it provides four options: NOS, PCM, DSD, and ALL. PCM supports up to 32bit/768kHz, and DSD supports up to DSD512. Additionally, the digital filter offers six different types of impulse responses, allowing users to select according to their preferences. These two features can be easily configured using the button located on the left side of the front panel, and the changes are instantly reflected on the Hidden Screen without any delay.

overviewFields.title: Fiber Optic USB
overviewFields.value: The SFP USB, featuring optical converting functionality, completely blocks digital noise from the source device. When connected to RS130, which supports SFP USB ports, you can receive pure data without any noise interference, ensuring the cleanest transmission possible.

overviewFields.title: External Master Clock Input
overviewFields.value: Audio sources require a master clock input that outputs synchronized audio data with the master clock. By applying this method, jitter from optical, coaxial, and AES/EBU connections from the audio source to the DAC can be eliminated, supporting perfect synchronization between devices tailored to the operating environment.

overviewFields.title: Hidden Screen
overviewFields.value: Designed with simplicity and sophistication to convey coherence with HiFi ROSE network devices, RD160 features a Hidden Screen on its front panel. When powered on, the circuit-like design flow chart, sound waves, and volume curve displayed on the screen intuitively present various information at a glance. Additionally, immediate responses to button and know operations without any delay, offers a sensation of controlling an analog device. Thus, the RD160 not only enhances the pleasure of listening but also adds the visual satisfaction plus enjoyment of manipulation.

overviewFields.title: Design
overviewFields.value: The RD160 utilizes a specially processed aluminum case, machined from high-purity aluminum as a single piece with minimized assembly joints, to minimize vibrations that could adversely affect sound quality. Additionally, the side panels with heat sink design efficiently dissipate heat, ensuring stable operation even during prolonged use.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: RD160DAC-BLK

name: iFi Audio GO bar Kensei Portable Hi-Res USB DAC and Preamp

specifications.title: DAC
specifications.value: Bit-Perfect DSD & DXD DAC by Cirrus Logic

overviewFields.title: Forged for Masters of Audio
overviewFields.value: GO bar Kensei is akin to a legendary sword meticulously forged for a Kensei. Embodying the dedication of a master swordsmith, we focused on purity, balance, and refinement to reveal the true essence of your music. Featuring cutting-edge Japanese audio processing technology: K2HD, and improved power supply and clock circuitry, the Kensei represents the pinnacle of our journey of refinement in the GO bar range. Whether you’re commuting, working remotely, or traveling for pleasure, the GO bar Kensei offers a perfectly portable solution to elevate your headphone experience to heavenly heights.

overviewFields.title: Revitalize Studio Recording Sound with Legendary K2HD
overviewFields.value: Despite their pristine clarity, digital recordings sometimes seem emotionally flat and lifeless. Engineers at Victor Studio noticed a lack of emotion between their original masters and digital sub-masters, sparking a quest for a solution. They meticulously compared countless finished recordings with the copy recordings by ear, relying on their instinctive feel and human expertise. Their solution: K2 Technology.  The K2 Technology process revives rich, natural harmonics into digital sound, adding an organic quality unlike any other. K2 Technology processing revitalizes the studio recording sound, infusing it with life once again.

overviewFields.title: Tailored. Sweet Sound.
overviewFields.value: Listen the way you like with four bespoke digital filters and two analogue processing modes, each tailored to enhance your enjoyment across different music genres.

overviewFields.title: Advanced chip. Accurate clock.
overviewFields.value: The DAC section of the GO bar Kensei uses a powerful 16-core XMOS micro controller to process the audio data received at the USB input. Our in-house team has programmed the XMOS firmware to optimize sound quality and ensure a perfect partnership with the 32-bit Cirrus Logic DAC chipset. A customized digital filter minimizes pre-echoes and ringing artefacts. Our GMT (Global Master Timing) precision clock system ensures ultra-low jitter.

overviewFields.title: Compact and Powerful.
overviewFields.value: The GO Bar Kensei is crafted with Japanese stainless steel for maximum rigidity. With its compact dimensions of 65 x 22 x 13.2 mm, it matches the size of a USB flash drive. This makes it the perfect travel companion for your mobile, tablet or MacBook Pro, blending into your life for headphone use. Its USB-C connectivity ensures plug-and-play convenience, allowing for hassle-free use. The GO Bar Kensei offers a maximum output power of up to 477mW, which is about 10 times more powerful than an iPhone 15*. It incorporates two power tuning technologies: iEMatch for high-sensitivity IEMs, and Turbo mode for power-hungry headphones. This allows it to easily drive a wide range of premium earphones and headphones.

overviewFields.title: Cut the Crosstalk.
overviewFields.value: Connect to the GO bar Kensei via 3.5mm S-Balanced or 4.4mm Balanced headphone outputs. iFi’s exclusive 3.5mm S-Balanced technology cuts crosstalk and noise by 50% with regular single-ended headphones.

name: iFi Audio Go blu Portable Bluetooth DAC/Headphone Amp

specifications.title: Wireless
specifications.value: Bluetooth 5.1 (AAC, SBC, aptX, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX LL, LDAC, LHDC/HWA Codec)

overviewFields.title: Super light. Super sound.
overviewFields.value: iFi Audio's new GO blu, portable HD DAC/amp, is diminutive enough to take with you wherever you go! It gives you the best sound from wired but the convenience of wireless as you no longer need to have a cable connection to your smartphone.

overviewFields.title: Superior sound, unbound.
overviewFields.value: Wireless headphones or earphones of any kind integrate Bluetooth processing, D/A conversion, and amplification onto one, standard 'off the shelf' chip. There is a ceiling to the sound quality that can be achieved.

overviewFields.title: Go blu. Go beyond.
overviewFields.value: With its lightweight, soft-touch polymer enclosure (great for Bluetooth reception, unlike signal-blocking metal), copper-colored trim, and ChronoDial watch crown-style control, the GO blu is a pleasure to use wherever you go.

overviewFields.title: HD Bluetooth 5.1
overviewFields.value: The way iFi implements Bluetooth is anything but 'run of the mill' and despite its diminutive size, the GO blu is no exception.

name: iFi Audio GO Link Max Portable Amp & DAC

overviewFields.title: Become Your Own Remastering Engineer
overviewFields.value: This Digital to Analogue Converter (DAC) unlocks the true potential of your playlist, now boasting a 4.4mm headphone output, innovative new features and 10x the power of your iPhone.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Ultra-Portable

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Balanced Circuitry

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Hi-Res Music Support

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Improved Dynamics & Lowered Distortion

overviewFields.title: Small Size, Big Difference
overviewFields.value: Hi-Res audio is now within reach for everyone, with streaming services delivering high-quality sound to a wider audience. The GO link Max is the ultimate portable solution for both newcomers exploring the richness of Hi-Res music and audiophiles seeking simplicity and performance on the go. Featuring a balanced 4.4mm output and award-winning design, it combines plug-and-play ease with exceptional audio quality, making it perfect for any music lover.

overviewFields.title: Bringing the Balance
overviewFields.value: The GO link Max is iFi’s smallest, most portable balanced DAC, featuring balanced circuitry that extends interference elimination across the entire audio system. With S-Balanced technology enhancing the 3.5mm port and a balanced 4.4mm output, it delivers crystal-clear detail and channel separation for any headphone while preparing you for future audio upgrades.

overviewFields.title: Pocket Powerhouse
overviewFields.value: Modern portable devices like smartphones often compromise headphone performance, with many lacking a headphone socket or offering limited output via adapters. The GO link Max solves this with up to 241mW of output power—five times that of a MacBook Pro's headphone jack. This increased power doesn't just amplify volume; it unlocks your headphones' full potential, delivering fine detail and definition for an exceptional listening experience.

overviewFields.title: Dynamic Delight
overviewFields.value: The GO link Max uses the Sabre DAC’s Dynamic Range Enhancement (DRE) to deliver greater contrast between the loudest and quietest sounds, enriching every crescendo and quiet moment with energy and immersion. By combining DRE with iFi’s proprietary enhancements, it achieves an additional +6dB of dynamic range. This effectively doubles the perceived difference between highs and lows, ensuring every detail in your music is brought to life.

overviewFields.title: Little DAC, Big Heart
overviewFields.value: At the core of the GO link Max are dual ESS ES9219 Sabre DAC chips, each dedicated to a channel. This design delivers exceptional instrument separation and definition, creating a vivid, lifelike soundstage that places every musician with pinpoint precision. iFi then pushes performance further by adding some in-house tech of their own, to ensure elimination of jitter and distortion for crystal clarity and refined musicality. Your playlists will captivate you like never before, offering a "just one more song" experience every time.

name: iFi Audio hip-dac 3 Portable USB DAC & Amplifier

overviewFields.title: Titanium Shadow. Trendsetting Innovations.
overviewFields.value: iFi’s new battery-powered portable hi-res DAC/headphone amp is adorned in the Titanium Shadow hue, exuding timeless elegance with a touch of modern sophistication. The transformation extends beyond aesthetics. The hip-dac 3’s sleek Aluminum case houses new features, tailored to elevate your audio experience. Two USB-C ports simplify your cable management: one for audio and the other for charging. A switch on the underside activates iFi’s iEMatch technology, which is optimized for high-sensitivity headphones and earphones, making it especially beneficial for your in-ear monitors (IEMs). Inside, the device boasts circuit enhancements, including new metal film capacitors for a better frequency response. Additionally, an updated version of iFi’s GMT circuitry, coupled with a new crystal oscillator, further reduces phase noise, delivering a purer sound to you.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Full MQA Decoding

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Up To 12 Hours Playtime

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Advanced Balanced Circuits

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Reduced Jitter & Stutter with the Patented GMT Clock

overviewFields.title: Hip Flask size. Magnum Performance.
overviewFields.value: With its sleek, robust aluminum enclosure, the portable hip-dac 3 discreetly fits in a pocket or bag. It replaces the subpar DAC and amplifier in smartphones, tablets, PCs, and Macs. Just connect via USB-C, plug in your favorite headphones, and enjoy rich, dynamic sound. iFi’s expertise with the Burr-Brown chipset ensures optimal performance. However, a superior DAC stage involves more than just the DAC chip. A crucial element is the XMOS chip for processing digital audio inputs. The hip-dac 3 features a 16-core XMOS microcontroller, programmed by iFi’s in-house team to optimize sound quality and ensure a perfect hi-res partnership with the Burr-Brown DAC.

overviewFields.title: hip-dac 3 Your Power-Hungry Headphone
overviewFields.value: The hip-dac 3 features a true balanced circuit design, rare for its price range. This design minimizes signal distortion, resulting in a purer, more captivating sound for your headphones. The circuitry incorporates high-quality components, including a custom iFi OV op-amp, a low-noise power supply IC from Texas Instruments, and a premium analogue volume pot. The amp stage can deliver up to 400mW into a 32-ohm headphone load, making it compatible with a wide range of headphones. Additionally, it efficiently drives high-impedance headphones with an output voltage of 6.3V into 600 ohms from the balanced output.

overviewFields.title: Tailored For Your Headphones and Earphones
overviewFields.value: The amp stage has switchable gain, called PowerMatch, to ensure optimal power for the headphones you are using. An underside switch engages iFi’s iEMatch technology, optimizing output for high-sensitivity headphones, especially in-ear monitors (IEMs). It reduces hiss, enhances detail and dynamic range, and improves volume control range. XBass is a user-selectable feature that boosts bass without muddying the midrange, ideal for your earphones and open-back headphones. It works in the analogue domain, avoiding alterations via DSP.

overviewFields.title: Play All Your Files, Including MQA
overviewFields.value: Hi-res PCM and DXD audio data is supported at sample rates up to 384kHz, alongside DSD from 2.8MHz to 12.4MHz (DSD64, 128 and 256). Full decoding of MQA – the hi-res streaming technology, as used by Tidal’s ‘HiFi Plus’ tier – is also supported, performing the full ‘three unfold’ decoding process (as opposed to just the final unfold in the manner of an MQA ‘renderer’). Either side of the rotary volume control reside a pair of LEDs that change color to indicate the format and sample rate of the incoming audio.

overviewFields.title: Get Connected
overviewFields.value: The hip-dac 3’s USB-C input supports up to 32-bit/384kHz audio, compatible with USB 3.0 and 2.0. Its asynchronous design ensures jitter-free data transfer. A separate USB-C charging port allows use while charging, preserving a pure audio signal path. The hip-dac 3 provides two outputs: a 3.5mm socket for single-ended headphones and a 4.4mm balanced output for those with balanced connectivity, leveraging the device’s differential amp design. The 3.5mm output utilizes iFi’s S-Balanced circuitry, minimizing crosstalk and distortion for single-ended connections. The hip-dac 3’s 2,200mAh battery offers up to 12 hours of playtime, varying by volume and headphone power needs. It includes a USB-C OTG cable and a USB-A to USB-C cable.

name: iFi Audio iDSD Valkyrie Portable Amp & DAC

specifications.title: Bluetooth Formats
specifications.value: aptX Lossless, aptX Adaptive, aptX, LDAC, LHDC/HWA, AAC, SBC

overviewFields.title: Become Your Own Remastering Engineer
overviewFields.value: Designed for those who crave musicality and emotional depth, the Valkyrie takes the tools once reserved for the world’s top mastering houses and delivers them directly to your fingertips.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Lossless Bluetooth

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: xMEMS Support

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: USB-C Fast Charging

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 20,000mAh Battery for 18 Hours’ Playtime

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: JVCKenwood’s K2HD Technology

overviewFields.title: A Mastering Suite In Your Hand.
overviewFields.value: The iDSD Valkyrie isn’t just powerful – it’s personal. Designed for those who seek musicality and emotional depth, it lets you sculpt the feel of your music with technologies exclusive to the world’s best mastering houses - empowering you to become your own remastering engineer.

overviewFields.title: DSD Remastering
overviewFields.value: The iDSD Valkyrie is designed intently for those wanting to sculpt the feel and emotion of their music, to exactly how they envision it. Inspired by the artistry of mastering engineers, it features iFi’s bespoke DSD1024 Remastering algorithm, powered by a custom-coded FPGA. Similar to the technology used in Sony’s mastering studios, DSD Remastering transforms any file by increasing resolution and reducing distortion – delivering sound that rivals a professionally remastered recording.

overviewFields.title: K2
overviewFields.value: Born from the legendary Victor Studios, K2 technology was created to breathe life and emotion back into distinctly clinical sounding digital audio. To achieve this, JVCKENWOOD engineers analyzed thousands of original masters at Victor Studios, fine-tuning K2’s parameters guided purely by their own human expertise and intuition. Once exclusive to JVCKENWOOD, this remarkable technology now resides within the heart of the Valkyrie, ready to be experienced at the press of a button.

overviewFields.title: K2HD Technology
overviewFields.value: The Valkyrie incorporates two modes; ‘K2’ mode and ‘K2HD’ mode. ‘K2HD’ optionally upscales audio files to 192kHz/24-bit before applying selected K2 parameters for precise waveform shaping. It extends high frequencies to restore natural harmonics, achieving sound quality close to the original master. For those who prefer restoration without changing the sample rate, ‘K2’ mode provides a similar effect while preserving the file’s original resolution.

overviewFields.title: Perfect Your Headphones
overviewFields.value: Complementing its digital customization suite, the Valkyrie features analogue processing that transforms headphone listening into a captivating experience.

overviewFields.title: Quad-DAC Architecture
overviewFields.value: At the heart of the Valkyrie are four Burr-Brown DACs in a hybrid multi-bit configuration, drawing inspiration from iFi's long-standing experience with the legendary multi-bit Philips TDA1541A. First introduced in the Pro iDSD, this interleaved design captures the magic and impact of the iconic multi-bit chipset, but with superior low-level linearity for breathtaking detail.

overviewFields.title: Cut the Cord. Not the Quality
overviewFields.value: As pioneers of Lossless Bluetooth, iFi has equipped the Valkyrie with the latest technology to deliver CD- quality audio wirelessly, with zero data loss. It also supports genuine Hi-Res Bluetooth playback over LDAC and LHDC.

overviewFields.title: Next-Gen Compatibility
overviewFields.value: xMEMS is a cutting-edge driver technology for IEMs that uses the piezoelectric effect to deliver lightning-fast, accurate sound. The Valkyrie provides the correct bias voltage and equalization required to optimally drive xMEMS IEMs.

overviewFields.title: Colossal Battery Capacity
overviewFields.value: Lift the hood, and you’ll find four batteries, combining for a colossal 20,000mAh. Not only do batteries provide the cleanest power source, but they do so with enough life to last a flight from London to New York… and back. That’s up to 18 hours on a single charge.

name: iFi Audio NEO iDSD Desktop USB DAC/Headphone Amp with Bluetooth

specifications.title: Digital
specifications.value: USB 3.0 B (USB2.0 compatible)/S-PDIF (coaxial/optical), Bluetooth 5.1™ (AAC, SBC, aptX, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX LL, LDAC, LHDC/HWA Codec)

specifications.title: Formats: DSD512/256/128/64, Octa/Quad/Double/Single-Speed DSD, DXD (768/705.6/384/352.8kHz), Double/Single-Speed DXD, PCM (768/705.6/384/352.8/192/176.4/96/88.2/48/44.1kHz), MQA, Bluetooth 96kHz

overviewFields.title: The New Wave of Digital Sound
overviewFields.value: The NEO iDSD is the new 3-in-one DAC/amp. Since its release, iFi Audio has made some upgrades to the original version to create the NEO Performance Edition. With balanced 'PureWave' circuitry, unbeatable hi-res Bluetooth 5.1, and MQA, the NEO is the ultimate in hi-res playback. Team it with Qobuz to get access to an eclectic catalog of more than 70 million hi-res quality tracks.

overviewFields.title: Features:
overviewFields.value: Full MQA decoder, MQA over S/PDIF, Completes all 3 unfolds to deliver the highest possible sound quality, Uses state-of-the-art Qualcomm QCC5100 chip, Bluetooth 5.1, All hi-res codecs, Fully symmetrical dual-mono design - PureWave, Low noise/distortion op-amps, Max. 1033mW output

overviewFields.title: All Bases Covered
overviewFields.value: Enjoy the NEO iDSD as a pure DAC. Connect it to a separate integrated amp or preamp using the fixed-level analog output. Or treat it as a DAC/preamp with a variable output. The ideal companion to a power amp or active speakers. And headphone users will love using the excellent amp stage to create a fabulous 'head-fi' system.

overviewFields.title: Movies and Gaming 'upsampled'
overviewFields.value: The NEO iDSD Performance Edition will enhance your movie and gameplay experience even further. Add the included S/PDIF iPurifier2 to make movie or game audio match the amazing picture quality of your 4K TV. Feel more immersed than ever before as sound finally matches the picture in spectacular fashion.

overviewFields.title: Hi-Res Heaven
overviewFields.value: The NEO iDSD supports PCM up to 32-bit/768kHz, DSD up to 512, and DXDx2. All remain 'bit-perfect'.

name: iFi Audio ZEN Air Blue HD Bluetooth Desktop DAC

overviewFields.title: Let the Air in.
overviewFields.value: Enjoy unbeatable HD Bluetooth streaming from your phone, tablet, or computer.

overviewFields.title: ZEN Air Blue
overviewFields.value: Get maximum sound quality from Bluetooth audio with the ZEN Air Blue. The ZEN Air Blue is a high-quality Bluetooth audio receiver. It converts Bluetooth audio streams from smartphones, computers, or tablets into an audio stream suitable for headphones, amplifiers, and active speakers (speakers that run on their own DC power).

overviewFields.title: Hear the Difference
overviewFields.value: The ZEN Air Blue will give you the maximum sound quality from your device – your smartphone, computer, or tablet – as it operates at the highest audio resolution level of any Bluetooth system. The Bluetooth system inside has been upgraded by iFi to avoid the 40% drop in the audio quality you typically experience with standard Bluetooth (compared to wired audio). It’s the ideal way to wirelessly connect your smart device to a sound system in super hi-res (high resolution).

overviewFields.title: Effortless. Easy.
overviewFields.value: The ZEN Air Blue is ideal as part of a simple, new set-up for someone just starting out in audio who wants to experience the high quality of music streaming apps like Apple Music, Tidal, and Qobuz. Just connect your laptop, smartphone, or tablet to the ZEN Air Blue via Bluetooth and connect the ZEN Air Blue to your amplifier or active speakers via the RCA connections at the back.

overviewFields.title: Confident Compatibility
overviewFields.value: The ZEN Air Blue supports any current Bluetooth stereo audio codec (signal) available on the market today.

overviewFields.title: HD Quality Streaming
overviewFields.value: It’s also an easy, reliable way to add Bluetooth streaming to an existing set-up or upgrade the sound quality of any speaker or system that uses standard Bluetooth.

name: iFi Audio Zen DAC 3 Balanced Headphone Amp & DAC

specifications.title: DAC
specifications.value: Bit-Perfect DSD & DXD DAC by Burr Brown

overviewFields.title: Plug In. World Out.
overviewFields.value: The ZEN DAC 3 serves as your gateway to the world of high-resolution music, offering support for sample rates of up to 768kHz. This future-proof feature ensures full compatibility with all music formats available on streaming platforms, bringing you the best in sound quality. Equipped with a built-in headphone amplifier and the versatility to function both as a DAC and a DAC/Pre, this all-encompassing device is the only piece of equipment you’ll need on your desk. It seamlessly connects to headphones, preamplifiers, integrated amplifiers, or active speakers, offering a comprehensive audio solution for home and office.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Supports all high-res music formats up to PCM 768kHz, DSD512, and MQA

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: RCA, 6.3mm Singled Ended, & 4.4mm Balanced Outputs

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: XBass+ Mode Restores Lost Bass Frequencies

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: PowerMatch switchable gain ensures optimal power for the headphones you are using

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Improved circuitry for heightened signal purity and accuracy

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Equipped with a USB-C input for plug-and-play connectivity

overviewFields.title: Refined to Perfection
overviewFields.value: The acclaimed ZEN DAC series has garnered numerous awards, including being named WHAT Hi-Fi?’s Best DAC under £200 for four consecutive years. The ZEN DAC 3 continues its legendary status by doubling its high-resolution support up to 768kHz, DSD512, and MQA decoding capabilities. The USB-C connectivity streamlines cable management and provides USB input overvoltage protection, safeguarding it against potential harm. Moreover, a significant reduction in DC offset minimizes audio clicks when adjusting settings. These improvements propel the ZEN DAC 3 to new heights of audio excellence.

overviewFields.title: Powering Your Headphones
overviewFields.value: The ZEN DAC 3 goes beyond being just a USB DAC, boasting a built-in headphone amplifier equipped with both balanced 4.4mm and SE 6.3mm headphone outputs.  With its high-performance 390mW headphone output power, you can use it with a broad range of headphones.

overviewFields.title: XBass+
overviewFields.value: XBass+ is a switchable pure analogue signal processing mode designed to enhance the bass without compromising the clarity of the mid-range. It is perfect for use with IEMs or open-back headphones, which may lack bass response.

overviewFields.title: PowerMatch
overviewFields.value: The amplifier stage includes a switchable gain feature called PowerMatch, which provides a gain boost for more demanding headphones.If you have headphones that demand even more power, you can connect the ZEN DAC 3 to the ZEN CAN headphone amplifier using a 4.4mm to 4.4mm balanced cable, stacking them up as a ZEN system.

overviewFields.title: DACtivate Your Speakers and Amplifier
overviewFields.value: The ZEN DAC 3 features a Variable or Fixed output switch. In Variable mode, adjust volume using the knob when connecting directly to active speakers via iFi's 4.4mm to XLR cable or RCA cables. Use Fixed mode for connecting line outputs to a receiver or main amplifier. The ZEN DAC 3 is the most versatile USB DAC in its class, offering multiple usage options.

overviewFields.title: USB-C Powered, Upgradeable Performance.
overviewFields.value: The ZEN DAC 3, powered by USB-C, simplifying cable management. However, for audiophiles seeking to elevate their system, the 5V power input offers an upgrade path. When an external power supply is connected, the USB-C port will only transmit data, ensuring a purer signal. The iFi iPower2 is an ultra-quiet, ultra-clean audiophile-grade power supply, featuring Active Noise Cancellation II technology to cancel out all incoming EMI and RFI noise, you’ll never feel powerless against noise and graininess again. It is more than 10 times quieter than most audiophile power supplies.

name: iFi Audio ZEN One Signature DAC with Bluetooth, USB, and S/PDIF

specifications.title: Bluetooth 5.1 (aptX, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX LL, LDAC, LHDC/HWA, AAC and SBC codec)
Bit-Perfect
specifications.value: DSD & DXD DAC by Burr Brown

overviewFields.title: ONE to rule your home audio. The only DAC you'll need!
overviewFields.value: The ZEN One Signature takes the DAC stage from the ZEN DAC V2, adds S/PDIF inputs (optical and coaxial) alongside the USB port, stirs in Bluetooth technology from the ZEN Blue V2, and seasons the pot with Signature-grade circuit enhancements to create a delicious audio brew.

overviewFields.title: Signature Special
overviewFields.value: The Signature series always includes extra special additions:

overviewFields.title: Home Hub DAC
overviewFields.value: The ZEN One Signature is the first ZEN DAC to support all hi-res: DSD256, PCM384, MQA384kHz, Bluetooth 96KHz.

overviewFields.title: Awesome Analog
overviewFields.value: Balanced circuitry is what the ZEN series is famed for. The ZEN One Signature continues that tradition with a balanced circuit design and 4mm balanced and RCA single-ended analog outputs.

name: McIntosh DS200 Streaming DAC

specifications.title: Coaxial and optical inputs
specifications.value: SPDIF (PCM), and bitstream MCT - SACD, PCM

specifications.title: USB Audio
specifications.value: DSD, DXD, PCM, HDMI - PCM, Dolby Digital, DTS

specifications.title: Streaming Support
specifications.value: Apple AirPlay, Google Cast, Spotify Connect, Tidal Connect, Roon

specifications.title: Supported Audio Formats
specifications.value: MP3, AAC, FLAC, ALAC, WMA, Ogg, Vorbis, WAV, M4A, OGG, AIFF

specifications.title: Bluetooth 5.0
specifications.value: AVRCP, A2DP, aptX, aptX HD, aptX LL

overviewFields.title: Effortless Streaming Meets High-End Audio
overviewFields.value: The McIntosh DS200 Streaming DAC seamlessly combines high-fidelity audio performance with modern streaming convenience. Designed for discerning listeners, it offers effortless access to your favorite music while ensuring superior sound quality.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Versatile Streaming Compatibility

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Roon Ready and Roon Tested

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 8 Digital Audio Inputs

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Audiophile-Grade DAC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Google Assistant Compatible for Voice Control

overviewFields.title: Effortless Streaming Integration
overviewFields.value: The DS200 supports a variety of streaming platforms, including Apple® AirPlay®, Bluetooth®, Google Cast™, Spotify® Connect, and TIDAL® Connect. This versatility allows you to stream music directly from your preferred devices without the need for specialized apps or technical expertise. Whether you're hosting a gathering or enjoying a quiet evening, sharing and controlling your music is straightforward and intuitive.

overviewFields.title: Audiophile-Grade Digital-to-Analog Conversion
overviewFields.value: At its core, the DS200 features a next-generation, Quad Balanced, 8-channel, 32-bit Digital-to-Analog Converter (DAC). This advanced DAC ensures an expansive dynamic range and minimal distortion, delivering your music with pristine clarity and detail. For those seeking to elevate their digital music experience, the DS200 serves as a benchmark in high-quality audio reproduction.

overviewFields.title: Versatile Connectivity Options
overviewFields.value: Equipped with eight digital audio inputs, the DS200 offers extensive connectivity to accommodate various devices. These inputs provide flexibility for integrating multiple digital sources into your audio system. Additionally, the DS200 can function as a preamplifier in an all-digital setup, offering both balanced and unbalanced analog outputs to connect directly to your amplifier.

overviewFields.title: User-Friendly Design
overviewFields.value: The DS200 is designed for ease of use, eliminating the need for special control applications or advanced technical skills. Its compatibility with popular streaming services and voice control via Google Assistant ensures a seamless and enjoyable user experience. The inclusion of dual Wi-Fi antennas, a Bluetooth antenna, and an Ethernet port guarantees stable and reliable connectivity, catering to both wireless and wired network preferences.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: DS200

overviewFields.title: The Legend Continues
overviewFields.value: Forged from a half century of audio expertise and refinement, the NAD C 379 is more than just an amplifier--it's a testament to our relentless pursuit of sonic perfection. This HybridDigital amplifier is born from a legacy of simplicity, value, and innovation, featuring the second generation of NAD's MDC future-proof technology, 80 watts per channel of distortion-free power, and a high-performance ESS SABRE DAC that brings you closer to your music with breathtaking detail.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Customized HybridDigital UcD Amplifier with Stereo and Bridge Modes

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 2 x 80 Watts per channel of Continuous Power (8 and 4 Ohms)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 2 x 120 Watts per channel of Dynamic Power (4 Ohms)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Bridgeable for up to 300 Watts per channel of Continuous Power

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Industry-leading ESS SABRE® PRO 32-bit/384kHz DAC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: MM Phono Stage with Accurate RIAA Equalization and Ultra-Low Noise

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Built-in Separate Headphone Amplifier for Low and High Impedance

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: HDMI eARC, Optical Digital, and Coax Digital Inputs

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Dual Subwoofer Outputs

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Dual MDC 2 Ports for Future Upgrades and Expanded Features

overviewFields.title: Maximum Power And Performance
overviewFields.value: Every detail of the C 379 amplifier design has been refined for maximum performance. Starting with a customised version of the proven HybridDigital UcD output stage, the C 379 operates in a fully balanced bridge configuration. This allows for massive power with nearly immeasurable distortion and noise in the audible range. The power supply is capable of 80 watts continuously and over 120 watts instantaneously to allow for short-term musical transients. For even greater power, the C 379 can be bridged in mono with the C 268 to provide up to 300 watts per channel of distortion-free sound.

overviewFields.title: Brilliant Musicality And Detail
overviewFields.value: The C 379’s digital architecture is built around the critically acclaimed ESS SABRE® ES9028 DAC, one of the industry’s highest performance 32-bit digital-to-analogue converts with unprecedented dynamic range and ultra-low distortion. It provides ultra-high-quality music playback, free from clock jitter common in digital audio systems. The results are an exceptionally wide dynamic range, ultra-low distortion, accurate sound stage and unparalleled clarity.

overviewFields.title: Future-Proof Flexibility
overviewFields.value: Since 2006, NAD has led the way in providing users the flexibility to add features as new A/V technologies are introduced to provide unparalleled performance and value. Now, with the second generation of NAD’s Modular Design Construction (MDC) technology, the C 379 is in a class of its own. It features two MDC2 slots for upgrading the amplifier’s capabilities with emerging A/V technologies and additional features, including BluOS® high-resolution multi-room streaming and Dirac Live Room Correction.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Seamless integrations with smarthome control systems such as Control4, Crestron, RTI, URC, Push, Lutron, iPort, and Elan

overviewFields.title: Power to Spare
overviewFields.value: From input to output, every aspect of the C 389 has been engineered to deliver thrilling dynamics and transparent, detailed sound. The digital section is built around the same 32-bit/384kHz ESS Technology Sabre DAC chip used in NAD’s award-winning Masters M33 amplifier. Renowned for its near-zero levels of clock jitter, exceptionally wide dynamic range, and ultra-low noise and distortion, the ESS Sabre 9028 DAC enables the C 389 to deliver astonishing clarity and near-holographic imaging on all sources.

overviewFields.title: Future Forward
overviewFields.value: With its two MDC2 expansion slots, the C 389 can adapt to technological advances and evolving user needs. Introduced in 2006, NAD’s Modular Design Construction future-proofing technology lets owners of MDC-capable components add new capabilities by inserting an expansion module into an MDC slot on the rear panel. Starting in 2021, MDC2 is an all-new design that allows two-way communications between the expansion module and host component. NAD’s first MDC2 module is the MDC2 BluOS-D, which features BluOS high-res multi-room streaming and Dirac Live room correction.

overviewFields.title: Plug and Play
overviewFields.value: The C 389 has all the inputs you need to accommodate your audio source components. These include two optical and two coaxial digital inputs and two sets of RCA line-level analog inputs. The analog inputs have ultra-low-noise buffer amplifiers for greater sonic purity.

overviewFields.title: A New Classic
overviewFields.value: For over 50 years, the NAD brand has been synonymous with performance and value. The C 389 HybridDigital DAC Amplifier solidifies this reputation even further. With its precise volume control, ultra low-noise circuitry, and cutting-edge amplifier design, the C 389 will deliver thrilling dynamics and exquisite detail from all your musical sources. With NAD’s next-generation MDC2 future-proofing technology, C 389 owners can add exciting capabilities like multi-room music streaming and automatic room correction. The NAD C 389 can serve as the cornerstone of a high-performance audio system now, and for decades to come.

name: NAD Electronics C399 Hybrid Digital DAC Amplifier with MDC2 BluOS-D Module

overviewFields.title: Intelligent. Powerful. Efficient.
overviewFields.value: As the new flagship of NAD’s Classic series of integrated amps, the C 399 HybridDigital DAC Amplifier takes NAD’s commitment to lasting value and sonic excellence to a whole new level.

overviewFields.title: Features:
overviewFields.value: Included MDC2 BluOS-D module adds BluOS multi-room streaming and Dirac Live room correction, Hybrid Digital nCore Amplifier, Continuous Power: 180 Watts per channel into 8/4 ohms, Instantaneous Power: 250 Watts per channel, Vanishingly low harmonic and intermodulation distortion, Dual MDC2 Ports for expanded functionality, Jitter-free 32-bit/384kHz ESS Sabre DAC, Ultra-low-noise MM phono stage with infrasonic filtering circuitry, Two optical, two coaxial digital inputs, HDMI-eARC input, Two pairs of line-level analog inputs with low-noise buffer amplifiers, Speaker A/Speaker B outputs, Two-way aptX-HD Bluetooth, Dual subwoofer outputs, Dedicated headphone amplifier, IR remote, 12V Trigger in/out, IR in/out, RS-232 Serial port for control integration with home automation systems, Control4, Crestron, RTI, URC, AMX, Savant, Elan certified

overviewFields.title: Perfect Power
overviewFields.value: Trickled down from NAD’s Masters Series, the C 399’s HybridDigital nCore amplifier can deliver 180 Watts per channel continuous power, and 250 Watts per channel instantaneous power. Highly efficient and remarkably powerful, the HybridDigital nCore amplifier can produce musical transients effortlessly. The design is renowned for its wide bandwidth, flat frequency response, clean clipping behavior with instant recovery, high current capability, and stability into demanding low-impedance speaker loads. Noise and distortion are vanishingly low under all operating conditions. The minute levels of harmonic distortion are dominated by sonically benign second and third harmonics. The Hypex nCore design enables the C 399 to produce neutral, distortion-free sound even at very high listening levels, with exquisite detail, a superb portrayal of space, and thrilling dynamics.

overviewFields.title: Everything’s Connected
overviewFields.value: The C 399 can accommodate all your digital and analog sources. Its MM phono stage delivers ultra-precise RIAA equalization, extremely low noise, and high overload margins. The phono preamp also features an innovative circuit that suppresses the infrasonic noise present on all LPs, without compromising bass response. There are two sets of line-level line inputs, with low-noise buffer amplifiers to prevent sonic degradation. The C 399 has two optical and two coaxial digital inputs, plus an HDMI-eARC port for playing audio from a connected TV while controlling amplifier output with the TV’s remote control.

overviewFields.title: A Timeless Classic
overviewFields.value: As with every NAD amplifier ever made, the C 399 gets the basics right: a precise volume control with accurate channel balance, low-noise circuits, and correct input and output impedances. But it goes far beyond the basics. With its HybridDigital nCore output stage and high-resolution ESS Sabre DAC, the C 399 can reproduce all your digital and analog sources with a level of excitement and refinement that is unprecedented for a Classic-series integrated amplifier.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: C 399 BluOS

name: NAD Electronics D 3020 V2 Hybrid Digital DAC Amplifier

specifications.title: >76dB (MM cartridge source, IHF; A-weighted, ref. 500mV out)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: HybridDigital

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Bluetooth

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Qualcomm aptX

overviewFields.title: Reinventing an Icon
overviewFields.value: By adapting to today’s media sources and using state-of-the-art digital technology for the new world of digital music, the D 3020 puts a completely modern spin on a revered icon. The original designer of the 3020, NAD’s Director of Advanced Technology, Bjorn Erik Edvardsen, has been pivotal in developing the D 3020 for the new digital generation. Offering an excellent quality 24/192 DAC with 8 channels mixed to 2 for improved resolution, the D 3020 V2 represents the same kind of value-bending innovation that gave the original 3020 its legendary overachieving phono stage.

overviewFields.title: More Connected
overviewFields.value: The D 3020 offers inputs for your digital and analogue sources. Coaxial and optical inputs allow many different digital sources to be connected, from CD and DVD players, to set-top boxes, media streamers like AppleTV, or satellite and cable receivers. There are also analogue inputs including a sophisticated MM Phono input. Far from just another set of sockets, this Phono stage includes highly accurate RIAA equalization, an Infrasonic Warp Filter, and features both high overload margins and extremely low noise. With V2, NAD has also added a PreOut for increased connectivity in the output stage.

overviewFields.title: Power that Delivers
overviewFields.value: Power output may sound small at 40W per channel, but like all NAD amplifiers, this is very misleading, as a properly designed 40W amplifier can sound superior to a 100W amplifier from a lesser brand. With its very small form factor, the D 3020 will astound many for its ability to drive difficult loudspeakers to satisfying levels without adding noise or distortion.

overviewFields.title: Real World Performance
overviewFields.value: NAD rewrote the rules for amplifiers when designing the original 3020. Instead of letting laboratory test equipment have the last word, NAD made sure that they could properly drive real loudspeakers with real music for the real world. The D 3020 lives up to this promise through a unique implementation of NAD PowerDrive developed by Edvardsen, that allows low impedance drive (current) and high dynamic power (voltage) at vanishingly low distortion levels. This refinement of PowerDrive combined with a precision soft clipping circuit, lets the D 3020 sound even more powerful than it already is. An innovative Bass EQ circuit helps small speakers sound big without overdriving or damaging ported woofers.

overviewFields.title: Stream with Bluetooth
overviewFields.value: The D 3020 V2 delivers the convenience of wireless streaming with its Bluetooth capability. Stream all your music from a smartphone, tablet, or laptop. The D 3020 even supports the highest audio quality Bluetooth, aptX, which is becoming ever more popular for its excellent sound quality and low power consumption compared to Wi-Fi.

overviewFields.title: Mean and Green
overviewFields.value: The D 3020’s highly efficient design wastes less energy, requiring only 20% of the power needed by traditional Hi-Fi amplifiers. It’s like trading in a gas guzzling car for a hybrid vehicle. Standby power consumption is a miniscule <0.5W. NAD has taken amplification to new lows, with lower distortion, lower noise, and lower power consumption. NAD’s major focus is to find new technology that improves musical performance while consuming less power and using fewer non-renewable resources in manufacturing.

name: NAD Electronics D 3045 HybridDigital DAC Amplifier

specifications.title: >76dB (MM cartridge source, IHF; A-weighted, ref. 500mV out)

overviewFields.title: The Amp with All the Ins and Outs
overviewFields.value: The NAD D 3045 is everything a modern amplifier should be; compact, energy-efficient, powerful, silent, high-resolution enabled, and packed with cutting edge features like DSD and MQA playback. NAD’s expertise in both digital and analogue engineering is on full display in this flexible and affordable amplifier.

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: 2 x 60W HybridDigital amplifier

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Two-way Bluetooth powered by Qualcomm aptX HD audio

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Asynchronous USB 24/192 input supporting MQA and DSD

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: HDMI Audio Return Channel

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Coax and optical input

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: MM phono and line input

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Preamp out

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Sub out

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Headphone amp

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: IR remote

overviewFields.title: Higher Fidelity
overviewFields.value: Hi-Res is to audio, what HD is to video. It is more life-like, natural, and a much more enjoyable listening experience. With features like support for MQA music, the D 3045 can faithfully and accurately reproduce the full spectrum of sound encapsulated on the studio master. Until now, music-loving consumers have only been able to hear an edited version of the full fidelity because the delivery systems, be it tape, vinyl, or CD, did not have the capacity to hold all the information contained in the studio-master recording. With Hi-Res downloads and streaming, you can now enjoy exactly the same experience the artist heard in the studio when the recording was first made. This is revolutionary! Yet, 90% of the products on the market today do not have the full capability required to experience this new higher fidelity.

overviewFields.title: Amazing Capability
overviewFields.value: Every input and circuit you need to get the best out of your existing music collection is included, plus features that allow you to experience the sonic benefits of Hi-Res audio. Especially notable is the Asynchronous USB input for attaching a computer which allows Hi-Res streaming using one of the several Hi-Res programs like Roon, JRiver, and Amarra. Asynchronous operation uses the D 3045’s precision clock (instead of the computer's clock) to reduce jitter to a minimum and make the USB format work ideally for audio. For everyday convenience, NAD has included Bluetooth wireless streaming powered by aptX HD, the latest 24 bit Hi-Res version of Bluetooth that is being supported by more and more phones and tablets. You can also use its integrated two-way Bluetooth feature, and effortlessly stream music that is playing on the amp to any pair of Bluetooth enabled headphones. Or you can plug in your headphones to the built-in headphone jack and enjoy the exceptional performance of the low impedance, high current headphone amplifier.

overviewFields.title: Features You Won’t Find Anywhere Else
overviewFields.value: Love vinyl? The D 3045 features NAD’s super accurate, wide dynamic range, moving magnet phono preamp to extract every last morsel of sound from your LPs. If you still enjoy CDs, it has both analogue and digital inputs. The digital inputs allow the use of the advanced Hi-Res DAC built into the D 3045, or you can even send the sound from your TV to the NAD amplifier and seamlessly control the system using your TV’s remote by taking advantage of the HDMI ARC input. You can even add a subwoofer to the system with the convenient Sub Out jack.

overviewFields.title: Performance and Price
overviewFields.value: The NAD D 3045 includes advanced capabilities usually only found in far more expensive components. Hi-Res USB DACs start at about 3X the price of the D 3045. High current headphone amplifiers start at the price of the D 3045 and go up from there. Power amps featuring 60wpc and with the low distortion and high current capability of the D 3045 are rare at this price. Yet all these products are wrapped into one compact, energy efficient, and convenient package engineered by one of audio’s most iconic brands. Forty-five years of audio excellence is on full display with this innovative and versatile component. Just add your favorite music source and a great set of speakers to enjoy many years of sonic bliss.

name: Rotel CD14MKII CD Player & DAC (Black)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: High-Performance DAC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Isolated Power Supply

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Versatile Connectivity

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: User-Friendly Design

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Exceptional Build Quality

overviewFields.title: Exceptional Sound Quality
overviewFields.value: At the heart of the CD14MKII is a premium Texas Instruments 32-bit/384kHz digital-to-analog converter (DAC), ensuring accurate and nuanced audio playback. This high-resolution DAC captures the subtleties in your music, delivering a rich and immersive listening experience.

overviewFields.title: Isolated Power Supply Design
overviewFields.value: The CD14MKII features independent power supplies that separate the motor controls from sensitive audio circuits. This isolation minimizes noise and distortion, preserving the integrity of your music and allowing for cleaner sound reproduction.

overviewFields.title: User-Friendly Operation
overviewFields.value: With a smooth tray-loading mechanism, intuitive front panel controls, and an included remote control, the CD14MKII offers seamless operation. The clear graphic display provides easy navigation through your CD collection, including MP3 files, enhancing user convenience.

overviewFields.title: Versatile Connectivity
overviewFields.value: Equipped with a coaxial digital output, the CD14MKII can function as a CD transport, allowing integration with external DACs or other audio components. Additionally, a 12-volt trigger input enables synchronized power control with other connected devices, streamlining your audio system setup.

overviewFields.title: Precision Engineering
overviewFields.value: Rotel's commitment to quality is evident in the CD14MKII's design, featuring a total harmonic distortion of 0.0035% at 1kHz and a frequency response ranging from 20Hz to 20kHz ±0.5dB. These specifications reflect the player's ability to deliver audio with exceptional fidelity and balance.

overviewFields.title: Model
overviewFields.value: CD14M2B

name: Rotel RCD-1572MKII CD Player & DAC (Black)

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: High-Performance DAC

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Ultra-Low Noise Power Supply

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Balanced and Versatile Connectivity

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Premium Build Quality

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: Audiophile Sound Performance

overviewFields.title: Feature
overviewFields.value: User-Friendly Features

overviewFields.title: Exceptional Audio Performance
overviewFields.value: At the heart of the RCD-1572MKII is a premium Texas Instruments 32-bit/384kHz Digital-to-Analog Converter (DAC), ensuring accurate audio reproduction with a wide frequency response. This advanced DAC delivers stunning detail and extraordinary clarity, allowing listeners to enjoy their CDs with remarkable fidelity.

overviewFields.title: Precision Engineering
overviewFields.value: The RCD-1572MKII features an ultra-low noise toroidal transformer, manufactured in-house by Rotel. This transformer provides clean and stable power to the CD player's circuits, minimizing unwanted distortion and lowering the noise floor for a purer audio signal.

overviewFields.title: Versatile Connectivity Options
overviewFields.value: Designed to integrate seamlessly into various audio systems, the RCD-1572MKII offers fully balanced differential XLR outputs, unbalanced RCA outputs, and a coaxial digital output. These connectivity options provide flexibility for connecting to different amplifiers and audio components, ensuring optimal performance in any setup.

overviewFields.title: User-Friendly Design
overviewFields.value: The smooth tray-loading CD mechanism and included remote control make operating the RCD-1572MKII effortless. Its classic and refined design complements any audio system, while the robust construction reflects Rotel's commitment to quality and durability.
